component.summary: Microsoft Teams for Linux is your chat-centered workspace in Office 365
O Microsoft Teams é o hub de trabalho em equipe do Office 365
Microsoft Teams es el concentrador de trabajo en equipo de Office 365

description.p: All your team conversations, files, meetings, and apps live together in a single shared workspace. This app requires a paid Office 365 commercial subscription, or a free or trial subscription of Microsoft Teams. If you’re not sure about your company’s subscription or the services you have access to, visit Office.com/Teams to learn more or contact your IT department.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Microsoft Corporation.

O Teams reúne tudo em um espaço de trabalho compartilhado com o qual você pode trabalhar em praticamente qualquer lugar, facilitando a conversa com a equipe, a colaboração em arquivos e o trabalho com os aplicativos favoritos.
